title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 603.2 - Measurements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 603.2 - Measurements

State Regulations
(a) Service
providers shall gather accurate data consistent with the definitions contained
in section
602.1
of this Title for those
measures indicated by section
603.4
(c) of this

Part and: (1)
keep performance records and
retain them as specified by Part 651 of this Title for each entity level as
defined in section
603.3
of this Part and maintained
in a manner that permits audit by commission staff; and
(2)
measure answer time performance as
defined in section
603.3
of this Part, for customer
service centers that receive a monthly average of more than 275 calls per
working day for three consecutive months. Excluded from this provision is any
group of specialized business account representatives established to address
the needs of a single large business customer, or a small group of such
customers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
603.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
